In this PR, I define the two-sided continuous isomorphism of topological group , the corresponding class and basic lemmas about it. Copying most of the design from Mathlib.Algebra.Group.Equiv.Basic, with notations below:
图片.png

Hello, as we should avoid hom classes that use both algebra and topology, I was suggested to construct HomeomorphClass and use [MulEquivClass F a b] [HomeomorphClass F a b] instead, but I got some problem arranging PRs:
I was suggested to introduce HomeomorphClass in a separate PR , on which this one will then depend.
However, what I really need for my other PRs is only the API lemmas not involving ContinuousMulEquivClass, can I just delete the current lemmas involving ContinuousMulEquivClass and start two new PRs, one about HomeomorphClass and the other depending on the previous one to add lemmas involving HomeomorphClass to ContinuousMulEquiv?

Maybe I should follow the suggestion, doing that won't involve changing declarations.
PR for introducing HomeomorphClass created, #18689
